subject: resource/Silent_Hill_(film)
human_readable: Silent Hill is the subject of films shot in multiple formats.

questions.question: In what formats have Silent Hill films been shot?

llama3.1.reason: The context information provided only discusses the Silent Hill film (2006) directed by Christophe Gans, which was shot in traditional film formats, and does not mention any other films shot in multiple formats.
